name: Out of the Frying Pan, Into the Enemy Fire: PEW-PEW
name_original: Out of the Frying Pan, Into the Enemy Fire: PEW-PEW
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Welcome to Out of the Frying Pan, Into the Enemy Fire: PEW-PEW. This game is a mashup of ideas from our four programmers. Play as a metaphorical spaceship shooting their "feelings" to their waifu.  Avoid the attacks coming from their inner consciousness and don't let your waifu's words hurt you.

The "Out of Control" aspect comes into play with this game in the following ways:
1.  When you shoot you lose control of your ship and take control of your bullets.

2. The shot you shoot is randomized each time. Make sure to use the correct shot on the correct targets.

3.  The rules of the game change every couple seconds with "laws" that will appear on the top of the screen. A total of three "laws" can be active at a time. Laws can change how bullets work and can even change your control scheme.

4. Waifu is randomized each play-through <3

Choose your ending by shooting out the specific "feelings" you have for your waifu!
